nkwurịta okwu na ndị ọrụ ọrụ (CWU) bụ otu ndị ọrụ na-anọchite anya ICT na ndị ọrụ nzi ozi na ndịda Africa.

E guzobere njikọ ahụ na Mee 1996, mgbe Post and Telecommunication Workers' Association (POTWA) jikọtara ya na obere ndị ọrụ abụọ: Post Office Employees'Association, na South African Post Telecom Communication Employed' Associety
Dị ka POTWA, ndị otu ahụ sonyeere Congress of South African Trade Unions
Ọ bụ ezie na a na-atụ anya na ndị isi POTWA ga-emeri ntuli aka maka ndị ndu nke njikọ ahụ, kama nke ahụ bụ ndị otu POPWA meriri ntuziaka mbụ, nke onye isi ala Tlhalefang Sekano duziri.
